titles: An elegy upon the Marquess of Dorchester and Earl of Kingston, &c.
author: Crouch, John, fl. 1660-1681.
publisher: and are to be sold by Walter Davis.,
notes: Signed: By Jo. Crouch, once his domestick servant.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "If to some silent tomb we laid our ear ..."
Imperfect: A1:1[298] stained with slight loss of text; A4:1[36] stained affecting text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Dorchester, Henry Pierrepont, --  Marquis of, 1606-1680 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
